name: spo-add-list-template-with-custom-library
title: Creates and apply custom list template
shortDescription: Script that creates and applies custom list template with custom document library, site columns and site content types
longDescription: Script that creates and applies custom list template with custom document library, site columns and site content types. It will also creates custom library using new content types

references.name: Introduction to the SharePoint Online Management Shell
references.description: Check out the SPO Management Shell documentation site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
